snippet.title: Thronefall - Official Full Release Teaser Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description: Thronefall is a minimalist game about building and defending your little kingdom. It strips a classic strategy game from all unnecessary complexity and combining it with some healthy hack and slay instead. Build up your base during the day, defend it till your last breath at night. Thronefall's full release is scheduled for 2024. Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2239150/Thronefall/.
